text: Cette semaine, j’ai présenté ma vision pour bâtir un Canada plus fort dans un monde turbulent. Voici quelques-uns des nombreux exemples des erreurs de Justin Trudeau sur la scène mondiale et pourquoi le Canada a besoin d’une nouvelle approche.pic.twitter.com/CudGY5X7oU

This week, I laid out my vision for how I will make Canada stronger in a turbulent world. Here are some of the many examples of Justin Trudeau’s mistakes on the world stage and why Canada needs a new approach.pic.twitter.com/nLjaem4Yb5
Happy Mother's Day to all moms! Sharing a nice reflection on mothers and activism! #GPChttps://thenarwhal.ca/mothers-are-more-powerful-than-they-think-when-it-comes-to-the-environment/ …

Le système de santé public canadien a la particularité douteuse d’avoir les pires temps d’attente de tous les pays développés. Et nous faisons partie des pays de l'OCDE qui dépensent le plus en santé. Voyez la solution du @ppopulaireca :https://www.partipopulaireducanada.ca/sante_donner_aux_provinces_les_incitations_pour_reduire_les_listes_dattente_et_les_couts …

Canada’s public health care system has the dubious distinction of having the worst wait times of any developed country. And we are among the OECD countries that spend the most on health care. Read about the @peoplespca solution:https://www.peoplespartyofcanada.ca/health_care_giving_provinces_the_incentives_to_deal_with_wait_times_and_rising_costs …

Les Canada est une puissance dans l’Arctique. Nous devons affirmer que notre souveraineté dans le Nord n’est pas négociable. Je bâtirai un Canada plus fort dans un monde turbulent.pic.twitter.com/CCpbF31X1Y
Canada is an Arctic power and we must reinforce that our sovereignty over the North is non-negotiable. I will make Canada stronger in a turbulent world.pic.twitter.com/KgFW53yP4G

*Plateforme électorale PPC 2019* Un gouvernement du @ppopulaireca donnera aux provinces les incitations pour réduire les listes d’attente et les coûts en santé. Lisez notre proposition ici: https://www.partipopulaireducanada.ca/sante_donner_aux_provinces_les_incitations_pour_reduire_les_listes_dattente_et_les_couts …

*2019 PPC Platform* A @peoplespca government will give provinces the incentives to deal with wait times and rising health care costs. Read our policy proposal here: https://www.peoplespartyofcanada.ca/health_care_giving_provinces_the_incentives_to_deal_with_wait_times_and_rising_costs …

Un jugement aux É-U interdit aux politiciens de bloquer les citoyens sur leur compte Twitter public. La députée @MichelleRempel a bloqué des milliers d’usagers qui l’ont critiquée. La loi canadienne devrait-elle forcer les politiciens à permettre à tous de voir leurs tweets?

US judge ruled last year politicians cannot block citizens they represent on their public Twitter account. Tory MP @MichelleRempel has blocked 1000s who asked questions or criticized her. Should Cdn law force politicians to be transparent and let everyone see their posts? RT.

Must watch interview with Laurier U professor David Haskell on why he decided to run for the @peoplespca after he found out the Tories who had courted him first were afraid to take a stand on anything.https://youtu.be/etoRI6w7FVk

Scheer “remains something of an enigma” and is “little known.” But his speech was “reassuringly mainstream” and was a “decisive break” with the populist anti-globalist right. Now he only has to call for higher immigration to get full support from establishment. Clear enough?https://twitter.com/nationalpost/status/1127136833903656961 …

Non, c’est parce que Trudeau/Freeland ont refusé de mettre la gestion de l’offre sur la table, tel que demandé par les É-U, ce qui aurait mené à une meilleure entente pour les deux parties. Et VOUS avez appuyé les libéraux et vos amis du cartel du lait.https://twitter.com/PnPCBC/status/1125803587249037312 …

No, it’s because Trudeau/Freeland refused to put abolition of supply management and opening of our agriculture market on the table, as US asked, which would have led to a better deal for both sides. And YOU stood behind the Liberals and your milk cartel friends all the way.https://twitter.com/PnPCBC/status/1125803587249037312 …
